title: StaV
description: Harper, an optimistic 19-year-old with her whole life ahead of her, makes an unfortunate wrong turn and witnesses a murder taking place in an alley. With her life hanging by a thread, she is saved by a mysterious man, who at first glance seems like the perfect gentleman. Little by little, the truth unveils and a menacing plan unfolds, wrapping young Harper in an intricate web that she cannot get out of alive.Two first chapters.
author: Abigail K. Lind
